title: Topic 001 Question 283
body: A company has many accounts in an organization in AWS Organizations. The company must automate resource provisioning from the organization’s management account to the member accounts.
Which solution will meet this requirement?
options: Create an AWS CloudFormation change set. Deploy the change set to all member accounts.
Create an AWS CloudFormation nested stack. Deploy the nested stack to all member accounts.
Create an AWS CloudFormation stack set. Deploy the stack set to all member accounts.
Create an AWS Serverless Application Model (AWS SAM) template. Deploy the template to all member accounts.
